attributes.action: The UK should field UK sports teams in all international competitions
attributes.additional_details:
I think that in international competitions all sports teams should play as the UK. That includes football, rugby, athletics (where generally we do participate as GB) etc. Exceptions could be made for competitions which are primarily between the home nations (e.g. Six Nations).

The whole country could and would come together to support a UK team, in whatever sport, in a way which does not happen when England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland play separately. The Olympics was a great reminder of how this could work.

There are two benefits:
- greater unity across the UK in support of UK teams
- a better chance of winning (well, it couldn't be worse!)

Go Team UK

rejection.details: This is for the sporting authorities to consider/agree upon, not the Government.
